```{r}
# H0: µ_bjj = µ_boxing
# HA: µ_bjj < µ_boxing

t.test(Avg_Heart_Rate~Exercise_Type, data=DS_Project, alternative='less', paired=TRUE)

# ?? null hypothesis
# There is ??? sufficient evidence to support the claim that the average velocity from the wetsuit is 
# significantly higher than the average velocity from the regular suit
```


```{r}
DS_Project %>%
  group_by(Exercise_Type) %>%
  summarize(aveAvg_Heart_Rate = mean(Avg_Heart_Rate), seAvg_Heart_Rate = sd(Avg_Heart_Rate)/sqrt(length(Avg_Heart_Rate)), tstar = qt(1-0.05/2, length(Avg_Heart_Rate)-1)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Exercise_Type, y=aveAvg_Heart_Rate))+geom_point()+geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=aveAvg_Heart_Rate - seAvg_Heart_Rate*tstar, ymax=aveAvg_Heart_Rate + seAvg_Heart_Rate*tstar))+ylim(c(0,170))+labs(title='Average Across Sessions of Average Heart Rate for BJJ vs VR Boxing', y='Average of Average Heart Rate (BPM)', x='Exercise Type')
# make better labels
```

# Bar plot of all days
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

ggplot(data=DS_Project, aes(x=Session_Number, y=Avg_Heart_Rate, color=Exercise_Type))+geom_point()+ylim(c(0,170))+scale_x_discrete(limits=c(1,2,3,4,5,6))+labs(title='Average Heart Rate by Session for BJJ vs VR Boxing', y='Average Heart Rate (BPM)', x='Session Number')
```
